summary: This is a probate court affidavit filed in the Superior Court of the Virgin Islands regarding the estate of Jeffrey E. Epstein. Erika A. Kellerhals states she does not know of any will other than one dated August 8, 2019, which she received from Epstein, and confirms his death on or about August 10, 2019.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the probate action; his estate is being administered. He is identified as deceased, having died on or about August 10, 2019.

persons.name: Erika A. Kellerhals
persons.context: The person submitting the affidavit, stating she received Epstein's Last Will and Testament from him and attesting to the lack of knowledge of any other will.

persons.name: Brett A. Geary
persons.context: The notary public before whom the affidavit was sworn.

connections.description: Kellerhals states she received Epstein's Last Will and Testament from him, indicating she was entrusted with the document.

events.title: Execution of Epstein's Last Will
events.description: Jeffrey E. Epstein executed his Last Will and Testament.

events.title: Death of Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: Jeffrey E. Epstein died on or about this date.

locations: Superior Court of the Virgin Islands Division of St. Thomas and St. John
keyFacts: Erika A. Kellerhals affirms she knows of no will or codicil of Jeffrey E. Epstein other than one dated August 8, 2019.
Kellerhals states she received the Last Will and Testament directly from Jeffrey E. Epstein.
Jeffrey E. Epstein's death is confirmed as occurring on or about August 10, 2019.
The document is a probate filing initiating the administration of Epstein's estate in the Virgin Islands.
The will referenced was executed just two days before Epstein's reported death.
